iso_retirement.name: Southern Marakwet
iso_retirement.remedy: All existing uses should probably be Markweeta [enb]
iso_retirement.comment:
There is no evidence to support the existence of Talai as the name of a distinct
language. Talai is the name of a region. In the Ethnologue 15th ed., Talai has
been closely associated with Markweeta, neÃÅe Endo: "'Marakwet' is a cover term
for Talai and Endo." Thus it is appropriate to map any existing usage of the
code element for Talai to Markweeta, which now refers to the whole language area
and its dialects (whereas "Endo" referred only to the northern dialect area)
